Source code for straph.tx_to_csv

import csv
import subprocess
import pickle
import cProfile
import pstats
import time
import glob
import json



[docs]def tx_json_to_csv(directory_tx, directory_output):
    cnt = 0
    start = time.time()
    file_ouput = directory_output+"tx_2016.csv"
    # dict_dump1 = open(path_dict + "_dict_ip_2_nodes_label.pk", 'wb')
    # dict_dump2 = open(path_dict + "_dict_node_label_2_ip.pk", 'wb')
    with open(file_ouput, 'w') as output :
        writer = csv.writer(output, delimiter=';')
        writer.writerow(["time", "user_id_src", "user_id_dst","value","exchange_rate"])
        cnt_file = 0
        for filename in glob.glob(directory_tx):
            f = open(filename, 'r')
            cnt_file +=1
            time_file = time.time()
            for line in f:
                jline = json.loads(line)
                if cnt == 0:
                    t0 = jline["timestamp"]
                    cnt += 1
                t = jline["timestamp"]-t0
                user_src = jline["tx_ins"][0]["user_id"]
                xhcange_rate = jline["exchange_rate"]
                for dst in jline["tx_outs"]:
                    user_dst = dst["user_id"]
                    value = dst["value"]
                    writer.writerow([t,user_src,user_dst,value,xhcange_rate])
            print("Time "+str(cnt_file)+" file :",time.time()-time_file)
    print("Total time : ",time.time()-start)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    directory_tx = "/data/rannou/data/Transactions_2016_by_users/*"
    directory_output = "/data/rannou/data/Transactions_2016_csv/"
    tx_json_to_csv(directory_tx, directory_output)
